data.name: Super Chesslike Adventure
data.detailed_description:
The familiarity of chess in a fantastic new world of possibilities. Explore an open world as a party of chess pieces in search of corrupt kings that need liberating of their crown's duties. Beware the magical queens that protect them. Equip items to don magical powers. Create your own scenes in the level editor, and command respect in the online PvP arena.

OPEN WORLD FEATURES:

  • Varied and interesting environments, from lush forests to dry deserts.
  • Colorful cast of characters.
  • Find and complete quests from every corner of the globe.
  • Secrets around every corner.




ONLINE MULTIPLAYER:

  • Play against friends or strangers with the online mulitplayer mode.
  • Choose to battle on one of dozens of unique maps.
  • Play with specific win conditions and rulesets.



STORY CAMPAIGN:

  • Explore concepts of honor, liberty, and destiny in a classic adventure.
  • Build your army and defeat the forces of oppression.
  • Complete 100+ hand crafted story levels.




LEVEL EDITOR FEATURES:

  • Build your own levels and scenes, using the same tools the campaign was built with.
  • Share your levels with friends, or bring them into multiplayer.
  • Be featured among the best creators.





COMBAT PUZZLES:

  • Encounter head-scratching combat puzzles that will make you think in new and creative ways.
  • Challenges that will stump even for the most grizzled Chess veterans.
  • Enjoy variants not possible in a classic Chess game.




SECRETS

  • Find treasures and discover mysteries in every nook and cranny.
  • Leave no stone unturned and be rewarded with unique unlockables.
  • And so much more...

data.short_description: Explore an open world as a party of chess pieces in search of corrupt kings that need liberating of their crown's duties. Beware the magical queens that protect them. Equip items to don magical powers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Dual Core with Hyper-Threading
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory, 1GB memory recommended
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: If you can run Chrome, you should be able to run this game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8
  • Processor: Quad Core+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory, 1GB memory recommended
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes:

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory, 1GB memory recommended
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes:
